components/views/calculators-view.tsx.description: Primary pattern file for References page. Contains Section component for collapsible sections, header pattern with CircuitBackground + SectionLabel, themed styling (bg-card, border-border, text-primary), CaretDown icon rotation animation

lib/constants.ts.description: NAV_ITEMS array defines sidebar navigation tree. References should be added under RESOURCES parent with id: VIEW_IDS.REFERENCES, label: 'References', iconName: 'ListChecks'. Also requires VIEW_TITLES and VIEW_LOADING_TEXT entries.

lib/routes.ts.description: Route mapping requires: ROUTES.REFERENCES constant, case in getRouteForViewId switch, and exact match + startsWith check in getViewIdFromPath

components/views/references-view.tsx.description: References view component with 6 collapsible sections displaying BAS reference data. Uses ReferenceTable for tabular data (BACnet, Modbus) and AbbreviationList for grid-based abbreviation displays. First section defaults open.
